summary:
Traditional crown/s. 
Comes in tall and short version. Gold and silver colors
descriptionHtml:
UPDATED FILE!!! 
New file includes esp, that I forgot to put in, the first time. duh! :(

Traditional crown/s. 

Comes in tall and short version. Both sit at different positions on characters head. 
Gold and silver colors.
New mesh. (higher poly count and cleaner construction).
Less shine/glare (than my first crown).
Located in Whiterun blacksmith (Warmaidens) on the second floor, above the counter.
Should work for males and females.

To install, extract the Crown 2.0 data file into your Skyrim Data directory. 


I also used this crown mesh, in my new (NSFW) armor, but it has a better texture.
Check it here, if you\'re interested

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35119
author: cyric79
